pkgmetadata.longdescription: Wrapper for the 'Matchbook' API // Provides a wrapper for the some basic functionality around the 'Matchbook' http://www.matchbook.com REST API. It features calls to get events, markets and runners in data frame format. It features functions for bet placement and position management and also allows reporting of settled bet transactions. Note: this package uses the back-lay format. The default for odds type, currency and language are set according to those of the registered user account.
